channel.title: VPS Help?
channel.description:
I'm using Putty for the command console (or what ever you'd like to call it) I've installed JDK onto it but whenever I try to run my server, it won't work...
[code]nohup java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps-poi.jar;deps-mysql.jar;deps-mina.jar;deps-slf4j.jar;deps-slf4j-nop.jar;deps-jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server[/code]
give this error :
[code]ohup: ignoring input and appending output to `nohup.out' nohup: failed to run command `java': No such file or directory -bash: deps-poi.jar: command not found -bash: deps-mysql.jar: command not found -bash: deps-mina.jar: command not found -bash: deps-slf4j.jar: command not found -bash: deps-slf4j-nop.jar: command not found -bash: deps-jython.jar: command not found -bash: log4j-1.2.15.jar: command not found -bash: server.Server: command not found [/code]
Ubuntuu ( I think that's it ) is what I'm using.

item.title: VPS Help?
item.dc:creator: @Devastational Devastational
item.description:
@Devastational wrote:

I’m using Putty for the command console (or what ever you’d like to call it) I’ve installed JDK onto it but whenever I try to run my server, it won’t work…
